Mrinal Chandra Sarkar

Your job

As a Group Leader, you are responsible for the setup and the operational leadership of projects in the French part of Switzerland. Your responsibilities include:

  • Manage large scale projects (> 1 Million CHF) and/or supervise project portfolio in a profitable way and with customer satisfaction
  • Warranty the quality of the deliverables and make the project leaders apply project management best practices and ELCA standards
  • Take the responsibility to lead commercial offers and support sales to develop customer portfolios
  • Manage teams and resolve conflicts
  • Support and decision making regarding architecture and design
  • Report to top management in an efficient manner
  • Potentially manage partner and supplier relationships

Our offer

  • A pleasant working environment in an experienced, motivated and friendly team
  • An organization with flat hierarchies and collaborations across business departments
  • An attractive prospect for your professional and personal development
  • A collection of interesting and varied tasks
  • Working at one of the leading Swiss IT service providers

Your profile

  • Solid understanding of the IT-Industry (technical background)
  • Very good communication and presentation skills
  • Experience with agile methodology and development environment
  • Coaching and leadership of project staff

You are an entrepreneurial thinker and you are motivated to accompany innovative IT solutions from idea to successful implementation

You are a team player and have a solution-oriented mindset

Job location

Lausanne, Switzerland
